summary: THE INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET FAILED AT 60,000 MILES REQUIRING ABOUT $800 IN REPAIRS.  I HAVE BEEN DRIVING VEHICLES FOR 35 YEARS AND HAVE NEVER SEEN AN INTAKE GASKET FAIL.  I UNDERSTAND FROM MY MECHANIC THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM AND THAT GM IS AWARE OF IT.  GM SHOULD BE REQUIRED TO REPAIR THIS DEFECT AS IT COULD LEAD TO A BLOWN ENGINE WHICH WOULD BE VERY DANGEROUS IN TRAFFIC.*JB
